price: Inni cimdii hunda ishee uume qulqullaa’eera, waan dachiin biqilchitu irraa, lubbuulee isaanii irraafi wantoota isaan hin beekne irraa (kanta'an).
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna alladhī khalaqa al-azwāja kullahā mimmā tunbitu al-arḍu wamin anfusihim wamimmā lā yaʿlamūna
